name: afni_history
author: AFNI Developers
description: Show AFNI updates per user, dates, or levels.

inputs.description: Request verbose output (LEVEL is from 0-6)
inputs.name: Verbosity Level

inputs.description: Check history against given date. If most recent afni_history is older than the passed date, the distribution version might be considered out of date.
inputs.name: Check Date

inputs.description: Show help information
inputs.name: Help Flag

inputs.description: Show this program's history
inputs.name: History Flag

inputs.description: Show the list of valid authors
inputs.name: List Authors Flag

inputs.description: Show the list of valid change types
inputs.name: List Types Flag

inputs.description: Show this program's version
inputs.name: Version Flag

inputs.description: Restrict output to the given author
inputs.name: Author

inputs.description: Restrict output to the given level
inputs.name: Level

inputs.description: Restrict output to at least level LEVEL
inputs.name: Minimum Level

inputs.description: Restrict output to the given program
inputs.name: Program

inputs.description: Restrict output to final ENTRIES entries
inputs.name: Past Entries

inputs.description: Restrict output to the past DAYS days
inputs.name: Past Days

inputs.description: Restrict output to the past MONTHS months
inputs.name: Past Months

inputs.description: Restrict output to the past YEARS years
inputs.name: Past Years

inputs.description: Restrict output to the given TYPE (TYPE = 0..5, or strings 'NEW_PROG', etc.)
inputs.name: Type

inputs.description: Add HTML formatting
inputs.name: HTML Flag

inputs.description: Put a divider line between dates
inputs.name: Divider Line Flag

inputs.description: Reverse the sorting order (sort is by date, author, level, program)
inputs.name: Reverse Sorting Order Flag

inputs.description: Restrict entry output to field FIELD. Valid FIELDs include: all, firstline, day, month, year, date, author, program, level, type, desc, verbtext.
inputs.name: Show Field

inputs.description: List valid FIELD names for -show_field
inputs.name: Show Field Names Flag
